queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	{{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| parse regex ",(?<value>[0-9\.]+),[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:" nodrop
|count as events, values(state) as statuses, values(severity) as severity,min(_messagetime) as first_event,max(_messagetime) as last_event ,first(dimensions) as dimensions, first(timeseries) as timeseries ,first(value) as value by id,monitor,name
|trim(severity) as severity
|trim(statuses) as statuses
| (last_event -first_event) / (1000 * 60) as duration_minutes
|tolong(last_event) as latest
| formatdate(tolong(first_event),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as first_event
| formatdate(tolong(last_event),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as last_event
| count by id,latest,first_event,last_event,name,statuses,severity,dimensions,timeseries,value,duration_minutes | where duration_minutes > 0 or statuses="Resolved"
| round(duration_minutes,1) as duration_minutes
|sort latest |fields -latest,_count,statuses

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	 {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| parse regex ",(?<value>[0-9\.]+),[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:" nodrop
| max(_messagetime) as last_event ,first(dimensions) as dimensions, first(timeseries) as timeseries ,first(value) as value by id,monitor,name,state,severity

|tolong(last_event) as latest
| formatdate(tolong(last_event),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as last_event
| count by latest,last_event,name,id,state,severity,dimensions,timeseries,value 
|sort latest | fields -_count,latest

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	Created {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 

|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| parse regex ",(?<value>[0-9\.]+),[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:" nodrop
|concat (name," ",dimensions) as alert
| timeslice 15m | count by alert,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column alert

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	Resolved {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 

|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| parse regex ",(?<value>[0-9\.]+),[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:" nodrop
|concat (name," ",dimensions) as alert
| timeslice 15m| count by alert,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column alert

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	Created Critical {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| where state = "Created"
| count_distinct(dimensions) as entities,count as alerts by name,severity
| where severity = "Critical" | sort alerts

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	Created (Critical or Warning) {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| where state = "Created"
|count as alerts by name ,dimensions,severity| sort alerts

_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert 	Created Warning {{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop 
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| where state = "Created"
| count_distinct(dimensions) as entities,count as alerts by name,severity
| where severity = "Warning" | sort alerts

panels.title: Created But Not Resolved During Time Range

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=alert (created or resolved)	{{{filter}}}
| parse regex ",(?<monitor>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),TimeSeriesTrigger\("  nodrop
| parse "values=Map(*)), metaTags=" as dimensions1 nodrop
| replace (dimensions1," -> ","=") as dimensions
| parse "Created alert Alert(None,Some(*)" as id nodrop
| parse "Resolved alert * for timeseries *:*:* for monitor * with name" as id,timeseries,junk,dimensions2,monitor nodrop
| replace (dimensions2,"%``%",":") as dimensions2
| parse "with name *" as name 
| parse "* alert " as state
| sort _messagetime asc
|if(isempty(dimensions2),dimensions,dimensions2) as dimensions
| parse regex field=dimensions "metric=(?<timeseries>[^,]+)" nodrop
| replace(dimensions,/ metric=[^,]+,/,"") as dimensions
| parse regex ",(?<value>[0-9\.]+),[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:" nodrop
|count as events, values(state) as statuses, values(severity) as severity,min(_messagetime) as first_event,max(_messagetime) as last_event ,first(dimensions) as dimensions, first(timeseries) as timeseries ,first(value) as value by id,monitor,name
|trim(severity) as severity
|trim(statuses) as statuses
| (last_event -first_event) / (1000 * 60) as duration_minutes
|tolong(last_event) as latest
| formatdate(tolong(first_event),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as first_event
| formatdate(tolong(last_event),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as last_event
| count by id,latest,first_event,last_event,name,statuses,severity,dimensions,timeseries,value | where statuses="Created"

|sort latest |fields -latest,_count,statuses

_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus
| timeslice by 1m
| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| count by _timeslice,monitorid,name,status,previousstatus | fields -_count | sort _timeslice

_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus
| timeslice 1h
| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| where status ="Critical"
| count by _timeslice,name | transpose row _timeslice column name

_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus
| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| where status="Critical"
| count by monitorid,name,status | sort _count

_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus
| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| where status matches "Warn*"
| count by monitorid,name,status | sort _count

panels.title: Triggered Monitors Still Critical In Time Range

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus

| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| sort _messagetime asc
| last(_messagetime) as updated,last(status) as status by monitorid,name
| where status !="Normal"
| sort updated | formatdate(updated,"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as updated

panels.title: Triggered Monitors Resolved In Time Range

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus

| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| sort _messagetime asc
| last(_messagetime) as updated,last(status) as status by monitorid,name
| where status ="Normal"
| sort updated | formatdate(updated,"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as updated

_index=sumologic_system_events MonitorStatusChanged {{{filter}}}

| json field=_raw "details.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.currentStatus" as status
| json field=_raw "details.previousStatus" as previousStatus
| timeslice 1h
| if(previousStatus="[]","none",previousstatus) as previousstatus
| replace(status,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as status
| replace(previousstatus,/[\[\"\]]/,"") as previousstatus
| where status ="Warning"
| count by _timeslice,name | transpose row _timeslice column name

panels.title: Metric Monitor Detailed Status
panels.text: Metric alerts can have multiple series with 'per entity' status changes. These panels show state changes including per entity changes of state.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events disable*  MonitorsLibraryItemUpdated {{{filter}}}
| json field=_raw "to.isDisabled" as isDisabled
| json field=_raw "to.name" as name
| json field=_raw "from.isDisabled" as wasDisabled
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as user
| json field=_raw "operator.sourceIp" as src_ip
| json field=_raw "from.monitorType" as monitortype
| where isdisabled !=wasdisabled
| _messagetime as time
| count by time,isDisabled,wasDisabled,name,user,src_ip,monitortype | fields -_count
| sort time
| formatdate(tolong(time),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as time

_index=sumologic_audit_events disable*  MonitorsLibraryItemUpdated {{{filter}}}
| json field=_raw "to.isDisabled" as isDisabled nodrop
| json field=_raw "to.name" as name nodrop
| json field=_raw "from.isDisabled" as wasDisabled nodrop
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as user
| json field=_raw "operator.sourceIp" as src_ip
| json field=_raw "from.monitorType" as monitortype
| where isdisabled =wasdisabled
| json field=_raw "to" as new_config
| _messagetime as time
| count by time,name,user,src_ip,monitortype,new_config | fields -_count
| sort time
| formatdate(tolong(time),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as time
